channel.title: My talks on Byron's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in My talks on Byron's Blog

item.title: Disseminating Prediction Methods
item.description: I’m really excited to give this talk in Washington DC at JSM!

item.title: Accelerated and interpretable oblique random survival forests
item.description: I have given this talk in multiple places, but its original venue was the International Chinese Statistical Association’s Applied Statistics Symposium. I am also continuing to develop the slides in between talks.

item.title: Happier version control with Git and GitHub
item.description: I think there is a recording of this talk somewhere. I need to reach out and see if I can put a link to it here.
